name: Tanner
ability: °EOA (end of age): look at the top 3 cards of the discard pile.  You may add one to the demand pile.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw a card then discard.

name: Gatherer
ability: °When discarding development cards, you may play one of them as an event.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw a card then discard.

name: Diviner
ability: °EOA (end of age): look at the top 2 cards of the draw pile.  If one demands happiness, play it as an event.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw a card then discard.

name: Shoemaker
ability: °When opened, you may put the bottom demand card as a contract on any business.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw a card then discard.

name: Skinner
ability: °No ability.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw a card then discard.

name: Sculptor
ability: °AAA (as an action): discard a card and gain 1 gold.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw a card then discard.

name: Hunter
ability: °If you played an event as your action, you may play another event.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw a card then discard.

name: Warrior
ability: °Obsoleted by axes or swords.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw a card then discard.

name: Curer
ability: °When opened: You may start a business as a free action.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw a card then discard.

name: Astrologer
ability: °When closed, draw 1.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 1 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Smuggler
ability: °When you play an event, place it face-down.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 1 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Investigator
ability: °You may peek at opponents’ face-down businesses.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 1 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Warrior
ability: °Obsoleted by axes or swords.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 1 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Trapper
ability: °If you resolve an event with food demand, gain 1 gold.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 1 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Tailor
ability: °Your draw limit is increased by 1.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 1 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Butcher
ability: °You may discard a card as a free action.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 1 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Baker
ability: °When closed, you may place this on any unopened business as a development card.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 1 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Mystic
ability: °Once after drawing at the end of your turn, you may return the drawn card to the bottom of the deck and draw another.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 1 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Healer
ability: °EOA (end of age): If you provide more happiness than anyone, gain 1 gold
effect: If a single player provides the most food, they may play an event.

name: Councilor
ability: °When closed, pay another unpaid contract from the treasury.
effect: If a single player provides the most food, they may play an event.

name: Miner
ability: °When opened, gain 2 gold.
effect: If a single player provides the most food, they may play an event.

name: Broker
ability: °EOA (end of age): gain gold until you have 3 gold.
effect: If a single player provides the most food, they may play an event.

name: Apothecary
ability: °After you play an event as an action, draw a card (before event resolution).
effect: If a single player provides the most food, they may play an event.

name: Shaman
ability: °When you would resolve an event, you may choose not to (it still goes to the demand pile).
effect: If a single player provides the most food, they may play an event.

name: Warrior
ability: °Obsoleted by axes or swords.
effect: If a single player provides the most food, they may play an event.

name: Fruit Monger
ability: °When closed, gain gold equal to the age.
effect: If a single player provides the most food, they may play an event.

name: Prophet
ability: °Once per turn, you may examine the top card of any draw deck.
effect: If a single player provides the most food, they may play an event.

name: Alchemist
ability: °When drawing at the end of your turn, you may draw from age II.
effect: Players providing hides gain 1 gold.

name: Warrior
ability: °Obsoleted by axes or swords.
effect: Players providing hides gain 1 gold.

name: Juggler
ability: °EOA (end of age): gain 1 gold for each happiness in demand.
effect: Players providing hides gain 1 gold.

name: Fisher
ability: °When you close this, you may start a business as a free action.
effect: Players providing hides gain 1 gold.

name: Counselor
ability: °If you resolve an event with happiness demand, gain 1 gold.
effect: Players providing hides gain 1 gold.

name: Merchant
ability: °EOA (end of age): gain 1 gold.
effect: Players providing hides may discard a card.

name: Cook
ability: °When opened: You may play an event as a free action.
effect: Players providing hides may discard a card.

name: Warrior
ability: °Obsoleted by axes or swords.
effect: Players providing hides may discard a card.

name: Scribe
ability: °When opening a business, pay 1 less gold.
effect: Players providing hides may discard a card.

name: Seer
ability: °EOA (end of age): look at the top 2 cards of the draw pile.  Reveal and draw any that demand science.
effect: Players providing hides may discard a card.

name: Shrine
ability: °When you play an event, gain 1 gold.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw a card and then may discard a card.

name: Religion
ability: °Your tax each age is 1 gold.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw a card and then may discard a card.

name: Masonry
ability: °You may develop with one card per turn as a free action.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw a card and then may discard a card.

name: Whaler
ability: °AAA (as an action): replace the bottom demand card with one in your hand.\n°Obsoleted by swords.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw a card and then may discard a card.

name: Quarry
ability: °No ability.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 2 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Inn
ability: °If a business qualifies for a contract, you may place it on another business that provides as many resources.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 2 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Conservatory
ability: °Before playing an event, draw a card.  If it demands science, reveal it and draw 1 more.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 2 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Trader
ability: °When contracted, you may close this and open a business from your hand.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 2 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Tower
ability: °EOA (end of age): pay this contract from the treasury if it’s unpaid.
effect: If a single player provides the most food, they may start a business.

name: Bank
ability: °When the treasury runs out, gain 2 gold.
effect: If a single player provides the most food, they may start a business.

name: Tavern
ability: °EOA (end of age): earn 1 gold from a player who does not provide happiness.\n°Obsoleted by swords.
effect: If contracted weapon icon count is twice the player count: +1 population and treasury +3 gold.

name: University
ability: °EOA (end of age): draw a card.\n°When this is opened, draw a card.
effect: If contracted weapon icon count is twice the player count: +1 population and treasury +3 gold.

name: Wheat Farm
ability: °You may play one event per turn as a free action.
effect: Players gain 1 gold per stone they provide.

name: Arsenal
ability: °Obsoleted by swords.
effect: Players gain 1 gold per stone they provide.

name: School
ability: °AAA (as an action): swap the top card of the demand pile with a card in the event queue.
effect: Players gain 1 gold per stone they provide.

name: Laboratory
ability: °After starting a business, draw two cards then put one back underneath its draw pile.
effect: Players gain 1 gold per stone they provide.

name: Lodge
ability: °When you claim a contract, gain 1g.\n°Obsoleted by swords.
effect: Players gain 1 gold per stone they provide.

name: Theater
ability: °AAA (as an action): gain 2 gold from here.  \n°When this is opened, place 10 gold on it.  When discarded, discard the gold.
effect: Players gain 1 gold per stone they provide.

name: Orchard
ability: °EOA (end of age): you may open/close businesses and take contracts (usual costs and restrictions apply).
effect: Players gain 1 gold per stone they provide.

name: Spear Maker
ability: °Obsoleted by swords.
effect: Players gain 1 gold per stone they provide.

name: Jeweler
ability: °EOA (end of age): gain 1 gold per bronze provided by players.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw two cards and return one to the bottom of its draw pile.

name: Lumberyard
ability: °Obsoletes clubs.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw two cards and return one to the bottom of its draw pile.

name: Trade Post
ability: °When claiming a contract, you may treat one happiness, food, or science provision as any resource.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw two cards and return one to the bottom of its draw pile.

name: Bronze Mine
ability: °No ability.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they draw two cards and return one to the bottom of its draw pile.

name: Library
ability: °When drawing at the end of your turn, draw 2 then put one of them on the bottom of its draw pile.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 3 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Bazaar
ability: °Each turn, you may add one card from your hand to the top of the demand pile face-up.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 3 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Fort
ability: °To open, you must first close an opened stone business.\n°Obsoletes clubs.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 3 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Storeroom
ability: °Your draw limit is increased by 2.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 3 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Armory
ability: °Obsoletes clubs.
effect: If a single player provides the most food, they may develop a business.

name: Workshop
ability: °If you draw a card at the end of your turn, also draw 1 from the discard pile.
effect: If a single player provides the most food, they may develop a business.

name: Circus
ability: °When contracted, for each other opened business you have, gain 2 gold.
effect: If contracted weapon icon count is twice the player count: +1 population and treasury +5 gold.

name: Smelter
ability: °When you play an event, place it anywhere above the bottom event.\n°Obsoletes clubs.
effect: If contracted weapon icon count is twice the player count: +1 population and treasury +5 gold.

name: Dairy Farm
ability: °Starting a business is a free action.
effect: Players gain 1 gold per bronze they provide.

name: Insurance
ability: °When opened, place 10g here.  When the treasury runs out of money, pay unpaid contracts using this gold.
effect: Players gain 1 gold per bronze they provide.

name: Carpentry
ability: °After you develop, draw a card.
effect: Players gain 1 gold per bronze they provide.

name: Bridge
ability: °When you close a business, gain a free action.\n°Obsoletes clubs.
effect: Players gain 1 gold per bronze they provide.

name: Observatory
ability: °Each turn, you may peek at any top-most, face-down card.  If it’s not a business, you may swap it for a card in your hand.
effect: Players gain 1 gold per bronze they provide.

name: Barber
ability: °EOA (end of age): gain 1 gold for each card in your hand.
effect: Players gain 1 gold per bronze they provide.

name: Dock
ability: °When opened, place 6g here.  You may use this gold to open businesses.
effect: Players gain 1 gold per bronze they provide.

name: Garden
ability: °EOA (end of age): gain 1 gold for each other happiness you provide.
effect: Players gain 1 gold per bronze they provide.

name: Road
ability: °When opened, gain 1 gold for each type of resource you provide.
effect: If a single player provides the most science, they may contract any business using the top card of the discard pile.

name: Market
ability: °Each turn, you may reveal 2 cards with the same demand to gain 3g, then discard one of them.
effect: Each player gains 2 gold per science they provide.

name: Blacksmith
ability: °Obsoletes clubs and spears.
effect: If a single player provides the most science (not zero), they may draw 2 cards from the discard pile.

name: Temple
ability: °Each turn, take 1 gold from the treasury.
effect: If a single player provides the most science (not zero), they may draw 2 cards from the discard pile.

name: Gallery
ability: °Each turn, you may add one card underneath this business.  Its contract is worth 1 additional gold per card underneath.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 4 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Villa
ability: °When opened, gain one action for every 2 food you provide (including this).  Passing has no effect this turn.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 4 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Gravedigger
ability: °When opened, before discarding development cards, draw any two cards from the discard pile without looking at their faces.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 4 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Foundry
ability: °No ability.
effect: Pay unpaid weapon contracts.\nTreasury loses 4 gold per player, reduced by 1 per contracted weapon icon.\nDiscard the bottom demand card.

name: Iron Mine
ability: °No ability.
effect: Players gain 2 gold per food they provide.

name: Knighthood
ability: °Obsoletes clubs and spears.
effect: If contracted weapon icon count is twice the player count: treasury +8 gold.

name: Gymnasium
ability: °EOA (end of age): earn 2 gold from a player providing less happiness.
effect: If contracted weapon icon count is twice the player count: treasury +8 gold.

name: Shipyard
ability: °EOA (end of age): pay your biggest unpaid contract from the treasury.
effect: If a single player provides the most food, they may develop a business using cards from the discard pile.

name: Legion
ability: °Obsoletes clubs and spears.
effect: Players gain 2 gold per iron they provide.

name: Pawn Shop
ability: °When a hide, stone, or bronze demand is placed face-up into the demand pile, gain 2 gold.
effect: Players gain 2 gold per iron they provide.

name: Academy
ability: °When opened, return the development cards to your hand.\n°Obsoletes clubs and spears.
effect: Open, uncontracted businesses earn their owners 2 gold each.

name: Scriptorium
ability: °On your turn, you may turn the bottom demand card face-down.\n°Treat any one happiness demand as any resource.
effect: Deal the top two cards from the discard pile onto the demand pile.

name: Cafe
ability: °Take an extra turn after the turn in which you opened this (before EOA).
effect: Treasury +2 gold for each happiness icon in demand.

name: Arena
ability: °Each turn, gain 1 gold.\n°Obsoletes clubs and spears.
effect: Treasury +2 gold per player.

name: Museum
ability: °When drawing at the end of your turn, you may draw from the discard pile.
effect: Treasury +2 gold per player.

name: Importer
ability: °When opened, add two cards of your choice from the discard pile to top of the demand pile, face-up.
effect: Players providing iron may develop a business using cards from the discard pile.
